item.description: Would you wear someone?s jacket if it did not fit you? WHY WEAR SOMEONE ELSE'S CONCEPTS? It is common for people to inherit beliefs and concepts of lack, depression, fear and doubt from family and social pressures. The generational patterns of fear-based habits and negative beliefs are hard to break. This is what we call the ?Ties that Bind.? In this workshop we will propose cutting these ties. Adopting a more abundant, faithful, and joyful attitude will help free you from the old and make room for the new. A seminar presented by the Center of Light, New Haven, a school for Christian Mysticism.

group.name: Meditation & Inner Spirituality Group - New Haven

item.name: Seminar: The Ties That Bind
